name: World of Wolf Clans
description:
In the wolf simulator you will meet magic wolves fighting for survival in a fantasy kingdom. Join one pack of four living in the magic kingdom of the simulator and plunge into survival adventure. Try World of Wold Clans - live in kingdom of magic and experience survival in magic fantasy!

World of Wold Clans features:
- 4 different wolf packs
- Customization and upgrades
- Survival simulator and quests
- Open fantasy kingdom
- Breeding wolves

Join the pack!
Pick one pack of those living the fantasy kingdom. Each wolf pack is uncanny and has its own habitat in the magic realm and survival strategy in the simulator. Explore the magic kingdom, hunt and breed with your wolf pack. Use your fantasy! Magic, danger and challenge await in fantasy kingdom of the survival simulator. Fight the enemy wolf pack and use fantasy for survival!

Create unique wolf!
Your own wolf will roam the fantasy kingdom in the survival simulator! Pick a pack, gender and name for it. Don’t stop your care there - a wolf need food and water for survival in fantasy kingdom and leading a wolf pack to survival in the simulator. Seek ways in the fantasy kingdom to make your wolf and wolf pack stronger - complete quests, fight enemy for survival, explore the magic kingdom.

Fantasy survival simulator!
Live with your wolf pack in magic kingdom and fight for survival in the fantasy simulator! Quest rewards and battle experience will help wolf pack in fight for survival in the kingdom. Enter the magic tale - explore the kingdom of fantasy survival simulator with a magic wolf pack!

Try out magic survival simulator, explore the fantasy kingdom with your wolf pack in World of Wold Clans! Enjoy the magic fantasy with our survival simulator!
